word: G5481 - χαρακτήρ - charaktḗr - khar-ak-tare' - Express image

sections.paragraph: 1. the instrument used in engraving or carving
2. the mark (figure or letters) stamped upon that instrument
Part(s) of speech: Noun Masculine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (ஆண்பால்)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From the same as G5482; a graver (the tool or the person), that is, (by implication) engraving ([“character”], the figure stamped, that is, an exact copy or [figuratively] representation): - express image.
